action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ulder makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be with his shield.

action.name: +1 Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and Ulder pushes the target 5 feet away from him. Ulder then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Ulder, the target provokes an opportunity attack from that creature.

reaction.name: Guardian Strike
entries: If an enemy within 5 feet of Ulder attacks a target other than him, Ulder can make a melee attack against that enemy.
